resources.string: Get notifications on bus alerts and feeds from departments
Look for bus routes on the go!
Manage your internals, exam schedule and results with ease
Sign in using SSN mail id
Want to connect with the heads of SSN? explore here
Dhakshinamoorthy D (Bus) | Amritha Sudharsan (Event) | Shakthi Ganesh (Exam cell) | Sudhakar J | Yadhukrishnan P | Shibikannan T M
To know more about app updates, visit
Sorry! There aren\'t any volunteers sharing location for this route right now! Please try again later!
No one is volunteering for your bus currently! Press the \'Start Volunteering\' button to go!
Looks like the app didn\'t shut down correctly last time! Restarting screen…
Cannot start location sharing! Another volunteer is sharing their location for this bus currently!
You\'re online, but are you on a moving bus?\nCheck if your GPS is enabled!
You are offline! Please come back online to resume volunteering!
You are offline! Connect back to the Internet to start volunteering!
You are offline! Please come online to see your bus\' location!

Newer versions of Android tend to force-close background services when you clear your memory using the task manager. This is also true for any battery saver apps installed on your phone.
As you are the current volunteer, your location is being sent to the servers using a background service, and this process can be terminated by Android or other battery saver apps unexpectedly.
While you can still swipe away the app from your task manager after using it, you are requested to not clear your memory, while you are volunteering.
Thank you for your co-operation!
